ai-mil7.3.3:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, what are the two belongings to the Sangha?”
ai-mil7.3.3:1.2_0: “As a seed sown in it is rainy season, when it has been rained, well dropped, and well-controlled,
ai-mil7.3.3:1.3_0: In the same way, when a meditator is engaged in good conduct, the ascetic life, the ascetic life, and the fruit of the ascetic life.
ai-mil7.3.3:1.4_0: In this way you should practice rightly,
ai-mil7.3.3:1.5_0: This is the first kind of seed.
ai-mil7.3.3:2.1_0: Furthermore, an seed is sown in that field.
ai-mil7.3.3:2.2_0: In the same way, a meditator’s mind is easy to get forceful when it is easy to discern them. It is only for the purpose of attending to mindfulness.
ai-mil7.3.3:2.3_0: This is the second kind of seed.
ai-mil7.3.3:3.4_0: and yet she told her all.
ai-mil7.3.3:4.1_0: So, when the mind is present,
ai-mil7.3.3:4.3_0: At the end of the mindfulness meditation,
ai-mil7.3.3:5.1_0: The third enquiry is the third thing.
